The
    lecture "Fabrikbetrieb" (Factory Management) is part of the module "Fabrikbetrieb" or part of the module "Fabrikbetrieb und virtuelle Produktentwicklung".
Part of both modules is the exercise
"Projektorientierte Übung zum Fabrikbetriebs / Projekt Montagetechnik und Fabrikbetrieb (PMF)".
This lecture focuses on processes products, organizational issues, human and production equipment for manufacturing factory planning as well the design optimization of value creation networks.
can be found on our website, as well as for the module
In the summer semester 2024 the lectures will be held in presence or with the verbal explanation of the content (video file) on ISIS.
The live lectures takes place in PTZ S001. The detailed dates for the live lectures as well as for the publishing dates of the video lectures can be found here:
In addition, further videos and other materials are recommended (see the individual lecture section).
Throughout the semester there will be a consultation hour on Tuesday mornings (9:30 am) and Thursday afternoons (14:00 pm), dates and Zoom link can be found on the ISIS page of this course.
